title: OAuth Token
description: User-specific OAuth tokens for credentials that require per-user authentication

id.description: Unique identifier of the OAuth token entity instance.

userId.description: Reference to the user who owns this token.

credentialsId.description: Reference to the credentials entity this token belongs to.

expiresAt.description: Token expiration timestamp in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

scopes.description: OAuth scopes granted for this token.

status.description: Current status of the OAuth token.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Timestamp when the token was last refreshed.

refreshFailureReason.description: Reason for the last refresh failure.

authorizationCode.description: Original authorization code used to obtain this token (temporary, cleared after use).

state.description: OAuth state parameter used during authorization (temporary, cleared after use).

createdAt.description: Creation time of the token in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

updatedAt.description: Last update time of the token in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

deleted.description: When true indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
